channel.title: Science on Wojciech Francuzik
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Wojciech Francuzik

item.title: Init lab
item.description: Introduction This is my initial post. Communication in science is changing not so rapidly as it should. Use of new tools and methods may drive change in the way we communicate experiment results. I have been using R and Rstudio extensively since last 4 years. It has proven exeptionally well suited for making science and my latest attempts at producing full manuscripts in RStudio were suprisingly successful. This lead me to investigating new forms of scientific communication.
